name: Sno (Bob2079)
description:
Sno - a snow themed 3D puzzle game with Sokoban inspired mechanics.

- - -

Controls:

WS - Movement forward/backwards

AD - Rotate left/right

R - Reset level

Z/Y - Undo/Redo

C - Switch camera mode

Left/Right Click - Rotate camera

Scroll Wheel or Minus/Plus - Zoom in/out

K/L - Skip to previous/next level

- - -

I wanted to add music, sfx, and decorations but ran out of energy so please pretend they are there or something. : )

12 Levels (not including Intro and Ending level).

Web build is untested. There are sometimes unintended inconsistencies with moving object hitboxes (particularly the last level). The solution is just to undo.
